isosensitivity: (Standard Output Sensitivity) i.ISO / 100 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600; High Sensitivity Mode (ISO1600 - 6400)
osdlanguage: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Russian, Chinese (Traditional), Chinese (Simplified), Netherlandic, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese, Arabic, Persian, Japanese, Swedish, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Vietnamese, Hindi
label8: The Auto Scene Selector senses the ambient conditions and automatically selects any of the Scenery, Portrait, Macro, Night Portrait, Night Scenery or Sunset Mode accordingly.
lcd: 2.7" (6.7 cm) TFT Screen LCD Display (230K dots)
focusrange: Normal / Auto Scene: Wide 10 cm - infinity / Tele 100 cm - infinity
motionpicturerecording: HD Video - 1,280 x 720 pixels, 30 fps (Motion JPEG); STD Video - 640 x 480 pixels(VGA), 30 fps (Motion JPEG); 320 x 240 pixels(QVGA), 30 fps (Motion JPEG)
weight: 106 g (0.23 lb) without Battery and SD Memory Card; 121 g (0.27 lb) with Battery and SD Memory Card
label12: The Panorama Shot Mode makes it is possible to shoot a horizontal / vertical panoramic image with consequent shots taken by overlaying the previous image.
label10: The DMC-F5 can record HD video in Motion JPEG format (1,280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps). Recording motion image can be started with a press of an independent motion picture button, which is extremely convenient for you to switch photo / video shooting instantly.
label14: The DMC-F5 complies with USB power charging in addition to the conventional AC power supply. The efficient, rechargeable lithium-ion battery lets you take approx. 250 shots on a single battery charge.
